app.title: Moon Calendar
app.introduction: Are you looking for a simple moon calendar? Now you found it! With this web app you can generate your personal moon calendar, not only with moon phases, but also with special events about the moon. You can export your personal calendar at the bottom of the page as an iCalendar (ICS) file.

fromTo.date: Date format needs to be YYYY-MM-DD.
fromTo.minmax: Date needs to be between the year 1000 and 3000.

subscribe.title: subscribe to iCalendar-feed
subscribe.instructions: Copy the following link and paste it as a subscription link into your calendar application
subscribe.explanations: With this link all selected events will be shown for the previous half year and for the following two years.

about.title: About this site
about.introduction: The aim of this project is to provide a simple and neat moon calendar for everyone. The data is calculated and collected from various sources to the best of one''s knowledge and belief.

support.title: Do you want to support this project?

improveTranslation.title: Do you have a suggestion for a better translation?

fromTo.tolargefordaily: When selecting daily phases only {0} years can be displayed.
